TitleEnglish: My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Hero's
SummaryEnglish: Akira Oda and his high school classmates are summoned to another world! While the other students are granted cheat abilities through the summoning, Akira merely gains the abilities of a mediocre “assassin.” However, his status soon surpasses “hero,” the strongest profession. After Akira becomes suspicious of the King behind the summoning, he is falsely framed for a crime and forced to flee.
Aliases: Asashin de Aru no Sutētasu ga Yūsha Yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi Nodaga
Asashin de Aru no Suteetasu ga Yuusha Yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi Nodaga
Ansatsusha de aru ore no Sutetasu ga Yuusha yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi Nodaga
Assassin de aru ore no Sutetasu ga Yuusha yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi Nodaga
My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Brave's
Ansatsusha de Aru Ore no Status ga Yuusha yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi no da ga

1.SummaryEnglish: Transported with his class to another world, Akira quickly discovers that he far surpasses his classmates.

2.TitleEnglish: The Assassin Takes Care of the Wounded
2.SummaryEnglish: Akira is fighting his way through the Kantinen Labyrinth when he encounters an injured elf.

3.TitleEnglish: The Assassin Plays With A Cat
3.SummaryEnglish: Akira Oda’s high school class is summoned to another world and granted abilities. Now, Akira is on the run!
